nodes.text: Argullians were a sentient near-Human species from the Mid Rim planet Argul.
Being a near-Human species, Argullians were similar to humans, but were distinguished by their yellow-colored irises in their eyes and their broad, flat noses.

Argullians developed on the Mid Rim planet Argul and they pursued mining, farming, science and technology. During the Clone Wars, many Argullians were killed during the Battle of Argul and the Galactic Republic began to evacuate them from Argul's cities, which were the sites of a lot of fighting.
